## Plot

```{r, include=FALSE}
df <- params$dataframe

db.limits <- c(max(0,min(df$db)-.5), max(df$db)+.5)
ber.limits <- c(min(df$ber)/10, max(df$ber)*10)
```


```{r, echo=TRUE}

#ggplot2::qplot(x = db, y = ber, data = df, xlim = db.limits, ylim = ber.limits, geom = "smooth")
ggplot2::qplot(x = db, y = ber, data = df, xlim = db.limits, ylim = ber.limits)+ggplot2::scale_y_log10()

```
